title: Revolutionizing Agriculture: Motivational Insights from Jordan Peterson for Personal Growth

tasks.task: Criticizing agricultural practices and defending current methods
subtasks: Acknowledging economic reasons for minimizing fertilizer use
Mentioning the use of satellite technology in agriculture
Highlighting significant reduction in fertilizer usage over 40 years
Noting increased food production as a result of these reductions
Questioning the competence of farmers who continue certain practices
